outputs.output_descr: The objective of the project is to build a foundation for a nationally-owned pro-poor policy framework on urban development in Uganda. It should take a holistic and inclusive strategy throughout the project, covering key strategic areas such as democratic governance, poverty, environment, health, sanitation, transportation and disaster management and gender sensitive. The project will specifically conduct a national urban policy analysis and support the formulation of a draft national urban policy.

project_descr: The objective of the project is to build a foundation for a nationally-owned pro-poor policy framework on urban development in Uganda.
